import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ApiRequest from "src/Api/Data/requestApi"; const Profile = ({category,existingCategories,back,id,DisableUser,BlockUserPermanet,username,checkeds})=>{ const [Details,setDetails]=useState([]); const [status,setStatus] = useState(); const LoadUserData=async (id)=>{ const result = await ApiRequest.getUserDetails(id); console.log(result); } useEffect(()=>{ LoadUserData(id); },[]); return <>
